summary:
An ancient dwemer artifact, the Aetherial sword, has been uncovered in the depths of Ildthand. However, it is guarded by a powerful guardian.

Do you have what it takes to face the guardian and take the sword for yourself?
descriptionHtml:
An ancient dwemer artifact, the Aetherial sword, has been uncovered in the depths of Ildthand. However, it is guarded by a powerful guardian.

Do you have what it takes to face the guardian and take the sword for yourself?

You will find Ildthand south of Ivarstead. It is a Dwemer dungeon.

Near it, you will also find the body of Marcus, a misfortunate young adventurer who attempted to claim the mighty sword. You will find a note on his body that has been written in his last dying moments.

Don't hesitate to leave me your feedback.

Enjoy!
author: Smike
